CustomField.formula: IF(AND(RecordType.Name='FS Flavor Change Chain HQ',FS_HQ_Chain__r.RecordType.Name='FS Chain'),'FS Chain', IF(AND(RecordType.Name='FS Flavor Change Chain HQ',FS_HQ_Chain__r.RecordType.Name='FS Headquarters'),'FS Headquarters', IF(RecordType.Name='FS Flavor Change Installation','FS Installation', IF(RecordType.Name='FS Flavor Change Outlet','FS Outlet',''))))
CustomField.label: Level
